dcterms:description: A large-scale person search dataset containing 18,184 images, with 8,432 different identities and 96,143 annotated bounding boxes, sourced from real street snaps and movies/TV, covering diverse scenes and variations.
dcterms:title: CUHK-SYSU

dcterms:creator: L. Zheng
H. Zhang

M. Chandraker

Q. Tian
dcterms:description: A dataset captured using six static cameras in a university campus, consisting of 11,816 video frames with 932 labeled persons and 43,110 bounding boxes, designed for person re-identification in surveillance scenarios.
dcterms:title: PRW
